import React, { Component } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import update from 'immutability-helper'; import Dropdown from '../../../FormComponents/Dropdown'; import getValueFromState from '../../../utils/getValueFromState'; import sampleTopics from '../../../utils/sampleTopics'; import worksheetOptions from '../../utils/worksheetOptions'; // eslint-disable-next-line react/prefer-stateless-function class FilterSection extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { open: false, worksheetName: '', topic: {}, sort: {}, }; } onToggleShowFilters = () => this.setState(({ open }) => ({ open: !open })) handleTopicChange = (topic) => { const { onSetFilteredTopicState } = this.props; this.setState({topic}); return onSetFilteredTopicState(topic) } handleSortChange = (sort) => { const {onSetSort} = this.props; this.setState({sort}); return onSetSort(sort); } submitNameFilter = () => { const { onSetFilteredState, onUnsetFilteredState } = this.props; const { worksheetName } = this.state; if (worksheetName === '') { onUnsetFilteredState(worksheetName); } const transformedName = worksheetName.replace(/\s/g, "").toLowerCase(); onSetFilteredState(transformedName); } render() { const { open, worksheetName, topic, sort } = this.state; const { currentView, onChangeView, onClearFilters, handleFilterChange, subjectFilters, handleFilterClick, difficultyFilters, sourceFilters, problemTypeFilters } = this.props; return (

    handleFilterChange(event, 'worksheetName')}/>

    {open ? 'Hide Filters' : 'Show Filters'}
); } } FilterSection.propTypes = { currentView: PropTypes.string.isRequired, onChangeView: PropTypes.func.isRequired, onSetSort: PropTypes.func.isRequired, onSetFilteredTopicState: PropTypes.func.isRequired, onSetFilteredState: PropTypes.func.isRequired, onUnsetFilteredState: PropTypes.func.isRequired, subjectFilters: PropTypes.array.isRequired, difficultyFilters: PropTypes.array.isRequired, problemTypeFilters: PropTypes.array.isRequired, sourceFilters: PropTypes.array.isRequired, onClearFilters: PropTypes.func.isRequired, handleFilterClick: PropTypes.func.isRequired, handleFilterChange: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default FilterSection;
